Docs.summary: The body of the lambda. Depending on the kind of lambda, this is either a Statement (single-line Sub lambda) or Expression (single-line Function).

Public ReadOnly Property SubOrFunctionHeader As LambdaHeaderSyntax

Docs.summary: The header part of the lambda that includes the "Sub" or "Function" keyword, the argument list and return type.
